import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import CardTable from "components/Cards/CardTable.js"; export default function Destinations() { const history = useHistory(); const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [editingDestination, setEditingDestination] = useState(null); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const [destinationData, setDestinationData] = useState({ destination: "", city: "", province: "Kigali", distance: "", estimatedTime: "", status: "active" }); const [destinationList, setDestinationList] = useState([ { id: 1, destination: "Huye", city: "Huye", province: "Southern Province", distance: "135 km", estimatedTime: "2.5 hours", status: "active" }, { id: 2, destination: "Musanze", city: "Musanze", province: "Northern Province", distance: "80 km", estimatedTime: "1.5 hours", status: "active" }, { id: 3, destination: "Kibuye", city: "Kibuye", province: "Western Province", distance: "120 km", estimatedTime: "2 hours", status: "active" }, { id: 4, destination: "Rusizi", city: "Rusizi", province: "Western Province", distance: "150 km", estimatedTime: "3 hours", status: "active" }, { id: 5, destination: "Gisenyi", city: "Gisenyi", province: "Western Province", distance: "140 km", estimatedTime: "2.5 hours", status: "active" }, { id: 6, destination: "Butare", city: "Butare", province: "Southern Province", distance: "130 km", estimatedTime: "2.5 hours", status: "active" } ]); // Filter destination list based on search term const filteredDestinationList = destinationList.filter(destination => destination.destination.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || destination.city.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || destination.province.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || destination.status.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const provinces = [ "Kigali", "Northern Province", "Southern Province", "Eastern Province", "Western Province" ]; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setDestinationData({ ...destinationData, [name]: value }); }; const handleEdit = (destination) => { setEditingDestination(destination); setDestinationData(destination); setShowForm(true); }; const handleDelete = (id) => { setDestinationList(destinationList.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const handleCancel = () => { setShowForm(false); setEditingDestination(null); setDestinationData({ destination: "", city: "", province: "Kigali", distance: "", estimatedTime: "", status: "active" }); }; const handleAddNew = () => { history.push("/admin/destinations/add"); }; return ( <> {/* Destinations Management */}

Destinations Management

{editingDestination ? "Edit Destination" : "Add New Destination"}

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="px-4 py-2 pl-10 pr-4 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" />

); }
